    const matched = location.search.match(/^\?to=([^&]+)$/)
    if (matched) {
      const to = decodeURIComponent(matched[1]) + location.hash
      history.replaceState(history.state, '', to)
      sessionStorage.setItem('navi_to', to)
    }
  }
})()</script>
